name: Fafa's Dicemy Emporium
description:
In Fafa's Dicemy Emporium you craft and sell potions to survive for another day. Alchemy... dice... herbs.... derbs! It's Dicemy!

First prepare and dice your juicy  diceherbs..DERBS. Then place your derbs on the recipe cards. Each card accepts only the specified combination. Lastly put your leftover derbs in to the cauldron and brew the potions!

After each day you gain more derbs and must pay for you expenses. Pay for upgrades to increase your profits.

Can you survive over 30 days? You probably wont.. ;D

Have fun, dicemist!
